ygData.subject: Thoughts on our class on Gameplay
ygData.msgSnippet: I posted some of my thoughts and opinions on our class over on the Gameplay Forum.  Figured might as well give it a shot since they have changed the posting
ygData.messageBody:
I posted some of my thoughts and opinions on our class over on the
Gameplay Forum. Figured might as well give it a shot since they have
changed the posting rules there now. Add your thoughts if you like I
suppose. It's at
http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum2/HTML/000228.html I
reposted my original letter since they had wiped the board when they
made the new changes. I just added a few more thoughts for the heck
of it as well.

Rosha Cristi, Bard of 51 {insert something musical here}
Guild Leader, Legends
Innoruuk
